Celebrating six years of business at LunaNode with a free credit promotion! This is for LET users only, you must have a LET account with <b>at least one comment in June/July 2019</b>.

* New customers: get $20 free credit! Expires after two months.
* Existing customers who have spent at least $10 credit: get $10 free credit! Doesn't expire!

You qualify for $20 credit if you do not have an account, or have an account but have neither paid nor received any promotional credit. You qualify for $10 credit if you have used at least $10 on LunaNode services prior to 19 August 2019. Others do not qualify for any free credit.

To receive the free credit, simply <b>PM me the e-mail address of your LunaNode account</b> on LET. If you don't have an account, <a href="https://www.lunanode.com/">sign up</a>!

LunaNode is a Toronto cloud platform featuring hourly billing, snapshots, block storage, startup scripts, cloud firewalls, and more. Toronto is our main location, but we offer services in Montreal and Roubaix as well.

<a href="https://www.lunanode.com/pricing"><b>Check out our pricing here.</b></a> Or, you can <a href="https://www.lunanode.com/features/"><b>learn more about our awesome features</b></a>.
